column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday January 30 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT - NEW CIRCLE RD AT RICHMOND RD:
column4: The outer loop is shutdown just past the bridge.  Multi-vehicle injury collision.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT - NEW CIRCLE RD AT RICHMOND RD:
column4: Traffic approaching Richmond Rd from Alumni Dr is being diverted to the Richmond Rd exit ramp.  Police are controlling the traffic signals.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT - NEW CIRCLE RD AT RICHMOND RD:
column4: UPDATE 3:22 p.m. - The outer loop left lane is now open.  The right lane remains blocked.
